May Relieve Joint Pain

As you age and your body produces less collagen, you are more prone to degenerative joint disorders like osteoarthritis.Some studies have found that daily collagen intake may help reduce joint pain and improve symptoms in people with osteoarthritis.

Studies have found that collagen supplements can help inhibit bone breakdown, which may prevent or slow the development of osteoporosis.
